verses.text: \w Some|strong="H1697"\w* \w time|strong="H1961"\w* \w later|strong="H1961"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w told|strong="H1697"\w*, “\w Your|strong="H3947"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H1697"\w* \w ill|strong="H2470"\w*.” \w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w he|strong="H8147"\w* set \w out|strong="H3947"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Ephraim.

\w When|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w*, “\w Your|strong="H5921"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w has|strong="H3478"\w* \w come|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*,” \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* rallied \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w strength|strong="H2388"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w bed|strong="H4296"\w*.

\w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* said \w to|strong="H7200"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*, “God \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w* \f + \fr 48:3 \ft Hebrew El-Shaddai\f* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H7200"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w* \w at|strong="H7200"\w* \w Luz|strong="H3870"\w* \w in|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* land \w of|strong="H7200"\w* \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w there|strong="H7200"\w* \w He|strong="H3290"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*

\w and|strong="H5971"\w* told \w me|strong="H5414"\w*, ‘\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w fruitful|strong="H6509"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w multiply|strong="H7235"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*; \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w multitude|strong="H6951"\w* \w of|strong="H2233"\w* \w peoples|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* land \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w descendants|strong="H2233"\w* \w after|strong="H2233"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w as|strong="H5971"\w* \w an|strong="H5414"\w* \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w possession|strong="H2233"\w*.’

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w your|strong="H1961"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w born|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w before|strong="H5704"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w here|strong="H5704"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* reckoned \w as|strong="H5704"\w* mine; Ephraim \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* mine, \w just|strong="H6258"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Simeon|strong="H8095"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* mine.

\w Any|strong="H1961"\w* \w children|strong="H3205"\w* \w born|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w after|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3205"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* yours, \w and|strong="H8034"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3205"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w names|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H3205"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* brothers \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* territory \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w inherit|strong="H5159"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H5921"\w* \w as|strong="H8033"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w when|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* returning \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w Paddan|strong="H6307"\w*,\f + \fr 48:7 \ft That is, northwest Mesopotamia\f* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w sorrow|strong="H5921"\w* \w Rachel|strong="H7354"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* \w along|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*, \w some|strong="H3530"\w* \w distance|strong="H3530"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* Ephrath. \w So|strong="H4191"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w beside|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w road|strong="H1870"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* Ephrath” (\w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w*, \w Bethlehem|strong="H1035"\w*).

\w When|strong="H7200"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*, \w he|strong="H3478"\w* asked, “\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* these?”

\w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* said \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w*, “\w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w has|strong="H2088"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w place|strong="H5414"\w*.” \w So|strong="H3947"\w* Jacob said, “\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w bring|strong="H3947"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*, \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w may|strong="H4994"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*.”

\w Now|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*’s \w eyesight|strong="H5869"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* poor because \w of|strong="H5869"\w* old \w age|strong="H2207"\w*; \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w could|strong="H3201"\w* hardly \w see|strong="H7200"\w*. \w Joseph|strong="H3808"\w* \w brought|strong="H5066"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* sons \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* father \w kissed|strong="H5401"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w embraced|strong="H2263"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w*.

“\w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w expected|strong="H6419"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w again|strong="H6440"\w*,” \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* said \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*, “\w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w now|strong="H2009"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w has|strong="H3478"\w* \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* \w children|strong="H2233"\w* \w as|strong="H1571"\w* \w well|strong="H1571"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H3318"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w removed|strong="H3318"\w* \w his|strong="H3318"\w* sons \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w his|strong="H3318"\w* father’s \w knees|strong="H1290"\w* \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w bowed|strong="H7812"\w* facedown.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w both|strong="H8147"\w* \w of|strong="H8147"\w* \w them|strong="H3947"\w*—\w with|strong="H3478"\w* Ephraim \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* \w toward|strong="H3225"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*’s \w left|strong="H8040"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w left|strong="H8040"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* \w toward|strong="H3225"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*’s \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*—\w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w brought|strong="H3947"\w* \w them|strong="H3947"\w* \w close|strong="H5066"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w him|strong="H3947"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w stretched|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w put|strong="H7971"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* Ephraim, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w younger|strong="H6810"\w*; \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w crossing|strong="H7919"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w put|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w left|strong="H8040"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*’s \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, \w although|strong="H3588"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1980"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* said: “\w May|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* God \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w whom|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H7462"\w* fathers Abraham \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w* \w walked|strong="H1980"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* God \w who|strong="H2088"\w* \w has|strong="H3117"\w* been \w my|strong="H7462"\w* \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w my|strong="H7462"\w* \w life|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*,

\w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \f + \fr 48:16 \ft Or Angel\f* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w has|strong="H3605"\w* \w redeemed|strong="H1350"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w* \w from|strong="H7451"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w harm|strong="H7451"\w*— \w may|strong="H8034"\w* \w He|strong="H3605"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* \w these|strong="H7121"\w* \w boys|strong="H5288"\w*. \w And|strong="H5288"\w* \w may|strong="H8034"\w* \w they|strong="H3605"\w* \w be|strong="H8034"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w by|strong="H7121"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w and|strong="H5288"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w names|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* fathers Abraham \w and|strong="H5288"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*, \w and|strong="H5288"\w* \w may|strong="H8034"\w* \w they|strong="H3605"\w* \w grow|strong="H1711"\w* \w into|strong="H4397"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* \w upon|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth.”

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* father \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w placed|strong="H7896"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* Ephraim’s \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H3027"\w* \w displeased|strong="H7489"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w took|strong="H5493"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* father’s \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w move|strong="H5493"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* Ephraim’s \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*’s.

“\w Not|strong="H3808"\w* \w so|strong="H3651"\w*, \w my|strong="H7760"\w* father!” \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w said|strong="H3651"\w*. “\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w one|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w*; \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H3045"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w refused|strong="H3985"\w*. “\w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w*, \w my|strong="H3045"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w*!” \w he|strong="H1931"\w* said. “\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w too|strong="H4480"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w too|strong="H4480"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w great|strong="H1431"\w*; \w nevertheless|strong="H1571"\w*, \w his|strong="H3045"\w* \w younger|strong="H6996"\w* brother \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w greater|strong="H1431"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3045"\w* \w offspring|strong="H2233"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w multitude|strong="H4393"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H7760"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* Jacob \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* said: “\w By|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w pronounce|strong="H1288"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w blessing|strong="H1288"\w*: ‘\w May|strong="H3478"\w* God \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w like|strong="H3478"\w* Ephraim \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*.’” \w So|strong="H7760"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* Ephraim \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* said \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*, “\w Look|strong="H2009"\w*, \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w about|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, \w but|strong="H1961"\w* God \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w bring|strong="H7725"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* land \w of|strong="H4191"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* fathers.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*, \w as|strong="H5414"\w* \w one|strong="H3027"\w* who \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w above|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* brothers, \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* ridge \w of|strong="H3027"\w* land \f + \fr 48:22 \ft Or one portion of the land; Hebrew shekem, which sounds like the town and district called Shechem\f* \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Amorites \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w bow|strong="H7198"\w*.”
